commit.title: [dune] [gitlab] Build Coq without Camlp5, test Ocaml trunk.
commit.message:
[dune] [gitlab] Build Coq without Camlp5, test Ocaml trunk.

We add a job testing the build of Coq with OCaml 4.08 [AKA `trunk`]

CoqIDE is not supported in 4.08 due to missing `lablgtk`, also `oUnit`
cannot be currently installed.

This is unfortunate as the test suite cannot be run; should be
addressed before merge in coordination with the `test-suite`
maintainers.

Many deprecation warnings happened in 4.08 so we use the `release`
profile to make them not fatal. Using a 4.08 build profile would be an
option too.

commit.title: [dune] [gitlab] Build Coq without Camlp5, test Ocaml trunk.
commit.message:
[dune] [gitlab] Build Coq without Camlp5, test Ocaml trunk.

We add a job testing the build of Coq with OCaml 4.08 [AKA `trunk`]

CoqIDE is not supported in 4.08 due to missing `lablgtk`, also `oUnit`
cannot be currently installed.

This is unfortunate as the test suite cannot be run; should be
addressed before merge in coordination with the `test-suite`
maintainers.

Many deprecation warnings happened in 4.08 so we use the `release`
profile to make them not fatal. Using a 4.08 build profile would be an
option too.
